flexform-mwoption-out-of-range: error for out of range numbering
flexform-field-secure-not-available: hidden html comment for no security set
flexform-field-invalid: Error message for Non valid fieldtype
flexform-external-request-not-found: Error message for External dependency not found.
flexform-query-handler-not-found: Error message for External handler not found.
flexform-query-handler-no-class: Error message for External handler Class not found.
flexform-query-handler-no-method: Error message for External handler Class method Execute not found.
flexform-extension-not-found: Error message for External Extension handler not found.
flexform-config-not-found: Error for not finding any config.
flexform-fileupload-file-not-found: Error message for file not found
flexform-fileupload-user-unknown: Error message when user is unkown
flexform-fileupload-file-title-invalid: Error message for invalid page title
flexform-fileupload-no-target: Error message when a title cannot be found.
flexform-fileupload-file-convert-error: Error when converting a image file to another image format
flexform-fileupload-file-move-error: Error message when PHP cannot handle the file
flexform-createuser-invalid-name: Error message for an Invalid username
flexform-createuser-disabled: Notice message that creating a new user is disabled in LocalSettings
flexform-createuser-username-exists: Error message for when an account already exists
flexform-createuser-email: Mail body with credentials when a new user is created
flexform-norequest-made: Error message when FlexForm has found no actions to process
flexform-noreturn-found: Error message when FlexForm has no url or page name to return to
flexform-return-outside-domain: Error/Cancel message when return url is outside the current domain
flexform-session-expired: Error message for when a Form session expired
flexform-session-no-token: Error message when a FlexForm token is not found
flexform-session-no-equal-host: Error message when a form host is not to equal to the submitter
flexform-unverified-email:
You need to confirm your email account first.

Please do it now by clicking on [[Special:ConfirmEmail|this link]]
flexform-anonymous-user: Please log in first.
flexform-docs-new-version-notice: There is a new version available for FlexForm. Please contact your administrator so he can update this extension
flexform-docs-no-new-version-notice: There is no new version available for FlexForm. The complete changelog is shown.
flexform-docs-new-version-table: Changelog from your version to this new version
flexform-captcha-missing-config: reCaptcha settings not found in Config
flexform-captcha-score-to-low: Your Captcha score is to low. You form is not submitted
flexform-rights-not: You do not have the rights to modify a page containing a FlexForm.
flexform-api-error-allpages: No allpages result from MediaWiki API
flexform-api-error-noquery-response: No query result from MediaWiki API
